justification: "All participants first completed a vision screening for normal or corrected-to-normal vision (20/30 acuity) using a distance Visual Acuity Chart (Precision Vision, 2017)."
"Participants also completed the Visual Acuity measure (Varma et al., 2013) from the NIH toolbox (Gershon et al., 2013) to further characterize visual abilities."

measured_by: Ishihara's Design Charts for Colour Deficiency
justification: Participants' color perception was assessed "using Ishihara's Design Charts for Colour Deficiency of Unlettered Persons (2020)."
"Unlike Study 1, in Study 2, vision screening was conducted using an Optec 5000p Vision Screener."
"Participants completed the full Cognition battery (Weintraub et al., 2013) from the NIH toolbox (Gershon et al., 2013). The Cognition battery assess a series of cognitive abilities..."
"In Study 1, participants completed the non-monetary skewed gambling task" designed "to examine...risky decision making for non-monetary outcomes."
"Participants completed a monetary skewed gambling task... where participants decided whether to take the risk" on symmetric, negatively skewed, or positively skewed gambles.
